meta_title: ERGODYNE 12621 CHILL-ITS 6710FR EVAPORATIVE FR COOLING TRIANGLE HAT LI
summary: Activated polymers bring cooling relief along with FR protection. Modacrylic cotton blend fabric. Fabric meets ASTM F1506 performance requirements (ATPV rating of 7.1 cal/cm2); classified CAT1 per NFPA 70E. Meets ASTM F2302 for flame resistance. Soak in water 2-5 minutes to activate. Remains hydrated for up to 4 hours. Re-usable, just re-wet. Colors: Solid Blue, Hi-Vis Lime.
meta_keyword: ERGODYNE 12621 CHILL-ITS 6710FR EVAPORATIVE FR COOLING TRIANGLE HAT LI

meta_title: ERGODYNE 12967 SHAX 6100 LIGHTWEIGHT INDUSTRIAL UMBRELLA 7.5FT DIAMETE
summary: The SHAX® 6100 Heavy-Duty Work Umbrella provides fast and portable relief from the elements to increase worker productivity and reduce weather-related delays. Engineered with a powder-coated steel frame, a reinforced weather-proof canopy and 300 denier polyester material, this lightweight umbrella is built to last. The unique tilt-top feature allows users to shade themselves from ultraviolet (UV) sun rays any hour of the day. A vented lime top provides airflow and visibility, making this a great construction umbrella for those scorching hot jobsites. The polyester shell also has protective coatings (Polyurethane (PU) and UV) which provide the ultimate shelter from sun/UV, rain, and wind. Whether working in a bucket, or on the ground, this heavy-duty umbrella is the ideal solution to help prevent heat-related illnesses on any residential, commercial, agricultural, construction or highway setting.
meta_keyword: ERGODYNE 12967 SHAX 6100 LIGHTWEIGHT INDUSTRIAL UMBRELLA 7.5FT DIAMETE

summary: The ProFlex® 375 Small Kneeling Pad is the perfect personal kneeling pad for comfort in static kneeling applications. This kneeling mat is small enough to throw in your tool organizer to bring to each jobsite, or to easily use around the house. The thick nonconductive nitrile rubber (NBR) closed cell foam will keep its shape over time, and won’t absorb liquids making it the perfect portable solution for knee protection. Designed for kneeling on cold surfaces, hard steel, concrete, grating, gravel and wet surfaces. Also great as a garden kneeler or for work around the house. The small kneeling pad is great for mechanics, construction, plumbers, electricians, flooring, or anyone looking for quick, comfortable knee support without having to strap on work knee pads. Pain-free kneeling increases productivity and helps prevent common knee injuries.

meta_title: ERGODYNE 29043 8004 GLOW WEAR HI-VIS BELT COVER LIME
summary: Hi-Vis Seat Belt Cover: Enhance driver visibility; observe and encourage employee seat belt compliance. ANSI-compliant polyester solid (3.6oz). 2" ANSI-compliant reflective material. Hook and loop closures. Fits standard width seat belt harness.
meta_keyword: ERGODYNE 29043 8004 GLOW WEAR HI-VIS BELT COVER LIME

meta_title: Squids® 3170 Tower Climber Tool Tethering Kit
description: The Squids® 3170 Tower Climber Tool Tethering Kit contains tool attachment and tool lanyard solutions specific for tools commonly used by tower climbers in the telecom industry, as well as linemen and antenna workers.
summary: Includes:  Three - 3780L Power Tool Trap One - 3705 Wire Screwgate Tool Tail (6-Pack) One - 3700 Web Tool Tail - Medium (6-Pack) One - 3755 Self-Adhering Tape Trap (12ft / 3.7m) One - 3770L Tape Measure Trap One - 3740S Hand Tool Trap - Small (4-Pack) One - 3740M Hand Tool Trap - Medium (4-Pack) One - 3740L Hand Tool Trap - Large (4-Pack) One - 3740XL Hand Tool Trap - XL (4-Pack) One - 3790 Shackle Trap - Small (2-Pack) Two - 3790 Shackle Trap - Medium (2-Pack) Two - 3790 Shackle Trap - Large (2-Pack) One - 3713 Elastic Loop Tool Tails™ Swivel (3-Pack) One - 3118F(x) Tool Lanyard One - 3108F(x) Tool Lanyard One - 3166 Coil Tool Lanyard One - 3011 Retractable Tool Lanyard
meta_keyword: Squids® 3170 Tower Climber Tool Tethering Kit
